name: Wall Trump - Donald & Hillary Edition
description:
+++ Political fun, Jump with the Trump! +++

“A Fun Voting Game”
“Engaging Vote collection Game”
“User-Friendly Graphics”
“Fun for all Ages”
_________________________________

Hey Oldies! It’s the time to install this game on your I Phone and enjoy the fun of collecting as many votes as you want to win your election.

This all new voting game will never let you bore with its functionalities. The two opponents have to face each other and jump over to collect the votes. Remember that only the taller can jump over the shorter. Tap left of right to jump towards the direction. Collect as many votes you can and beat your friends online.

Great time killer game for people loving politics. You can give yourself relaxation by hitting the maximum score on board.

Download this game today and enjoy the fun behind voting! It’s great fun for everyone!!

Game Features:

“Show off your Diplomacy skills”
“Simple & easy navigation”
“No internet connection required”
